page.title: 16BLACKBUSHE MARKET
page.content: Blackbushe Airport is the site of one of the largest markets in the South of England (intended for people who cannot trade on Saturdays).Admission is by membership.People come from miles around. It is not unknown for coachloads of people from as far away as the Midlands,to attend the Market, especially at Christmas. Stall holders, who come from a wide area start setting up their stalls early in the morning and almost anything can be purchased from electrical goods, watches, radios,carpets, and wallpaper , to meat, vegetables, food, clothes and shoes.
